oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-08-18 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 18, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performers Lonzo & Oscar, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Boyce Hawkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Jordanaires; Lonzo & Oscar; Tommy Jackson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ernest Tubb -- The Women Make A Fool Out Of Me (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces the Jordanaires -- Fighting For The Lord (Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- I've Had It (Lonzo & Oscar) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Tommy Jackson -- Sally Gooden (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ernest Tubb talks -- Stand By Me (Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert jingle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Hawkins, Boyce; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Lonzo and Oscar; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Texas Troubadours; Byrd, Billy
